alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Portage; Waupaca; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 27 at 3:34AM CST until February 27 at 6:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total ice accumulations between two tenths and four tenths of an inch, and snow and sleet accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Marathon, Portage, Wood, and Waupaca Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on ice or snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of ice accumulations and wind could cause minor damage to trees and power lines, resulting in sporadic power outages.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, blankets and a phone in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
